entry.def: A caricaturist is a person who shows other people in an exaggerated way in order to be humorous or critical, especially in drawings or cartoons.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who parodies in an exaggerated manner

auth_sentence.content: William Rudling is a caricaturist trying to discover whether people who look the same also sound the same.
